title: Dani Dyer dishes real truth on rekindling romance with ex Sammy Kimmence
text:

Dani Dyer has revealed what really happened when she got back together with ex Sammy Kimmence.

Following her split from Jack Fincham , six months after they won Love Island together, Dani was pictured snogging old flame Sammy outside a London boozer.

It was reported at the time that the couple had been going out and split before she went on the ITV2 dating show and met Jack, but it turns out that isn't exactly the case.

Speaking to Mirror Online at the press day for her new MTV show True Love Or True Lies, the 23-year-old said: "There was this whole thing that I was with him before but I was not with him before.

(Image: Dave J Hogan/Getty Images)

(Image: MTV)

"I knew of him and maybe we had a little fling but he was never my boyfriend so this is the first time he's been my boyfriend."

Dani gushed about how well her romance is going, but said she didn't want to give too much away, because she's going to spill all the details in a new chapter of her best-selling book, What Would Dani Do? My Guide to Living Your Best Life.

She said: "It's going really really well, he's a good boy.

"I bumped into him, I'm not going to say too much because I'm bringing out an extra chapter of my book. It was a really weird time and yeah it was just mad, I can't explain it."

Dani also addressed the numerous engagement rumours that have been floating around ever since she got with her beau.

(Image: GC Images)

(Image: MTV)

She told us: "I always say or comment things and have a bit of a laugh if I've had a drink and I'll say like, 'Oh are you gong to marry me?' and everyone's like, 'Dani demands marriage'.

"I'm not demanding anything, not yet, when it happens, it happens."

Dani is teaming up with her dad, hardman Danny Dyer for the second series of True Love Or True Lies.

While her old man acts as narrator - like he did on the first series - Dani will be hosting the show and heading into the house every single day.

The show sees a host of couples competing for a cash prize, although some of them aren't actually together.

(Image: MTV)

(Image: Instagram)

Contestants live together and take part in a series of challenges in a bid to figure out who's faking love and who's feeling it for real.

Dani says she loves being part of the show, even if her dad does make a few cheeky jokes about her.

She said: "I watched it [last time], it was weird because I'd just come off Love Island and my dad said he'd done that while I was in there.

"I loved it, it's so different and so fun, it was wicked. I was terrible at figuring out who was fake. You look at everyone individually and think they're fake, you sort of go off your own experiences, and that's what makes it so good. The fact that liars won last time says it all really."

(Image: Getty Images)

EastEnders star Danny left viewers in stitches with his quick-witted take-downs of contestants on series one, and Dani says this time is no different.

She said: "I've heard a few things from this series and he's such a wind up, especially now I'm on it.

"He does a few things and I'm like, 'How dare you?' but it works and he bigs me up as well so it's really cute."

* True Love Or True Lies premieres October 21 at 9pm on MTV and continues every night for two weeks
